# fonts.dtd this font file is important(as I test), If lose this file, X strat will have a problem. # We will add it here, not in bootscripts. # but I find font.conf is not in this package, so add it in bootscripts. /usr/share/xml/fontconfig/fonts.dtd /var/cache/fontconfig
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/lib sudo chroot $ROOT /usr/bin/fc-cache -f
